name: Sniki Clean Micro Kit
description:
Sniki Clean Shoe Cleaner Kit has been created to take on the world of dirty shoes, from the smelly, to the dirty to the downright disgusting, this micro kit has the tools to clean the outside, the soles and combat bad odors that linger around inside.  No excuses now for heading out with dirty or smelly shoes.

The following is included in the kit...

Sniki Cleaner: Formulated for use with our specially created Duck Pad, we use a crew of 10 types of softeners and detergents with just the right mix of optical brighteners to help brighten and rejuvenate colours. Stick just a few pumps into the Duck Pad, wet and squeeze your pad to create a rich foam, gently wipe over your shoes, and watch the dirt disappear.

Duck Pad: Designed by our top team of Duck Smart talent, the Duck Pad has been created to specially work with our excellent cleaning products and does so in many remarkable ways.  In cleaning your shoes pump a few glugs of Sniki Clean into the Duck Pad, wet the Duck Pad, then give it a good squeeze to create a slowly releasing nice rich foam. Then gently wipe over your shoes. The Duck Pads Micro Fibre outer layer collects the Dirt and grime and teamed up with the Sniki Clean will give your shoe one almighty clean.

Micro sole pad: This nifty round scour pad gets tough on all the hard grime and dirt that gets on the sole of your shoes.  Spray some Sniki Clean on the soles then agitate with your Micro Sole Pad, and give it a rinse to see those pumps back to their best.

Duck Air Fresh: This odorless formula is a blend of friendly bacteria, trained and hand picked at the Duck Smart HQ to take on, encase and absorb bad bacteria, ie smells.  These little dudes kill odor instantly so just spray it inside your shoes and let the little guys munch away.  If used daily your shoes will never smell again, result!

name: Helmet Cleaner Micro Kit
description:
No one likes a Dirty Helmet!
 The Duck Smart Helmet Cleaner Kit has been specially developed to tackle and combat any and all helmet cleanliness issues you may have!

name: Kit Clean Micro Kit
description:
The Duck Smart Kit cleaning package is the latest must-have addition to the Duck Smart Range! This package has been formulated especially to rejuvenate and brighten your kit!

Note: Please ensure your Duck pad has been put through your washing Machine several times before combining with your Kit (Mx mums will know the deal with mixing colors and whites)

name: Earth Mover Bike Cleaner
description:
Earth Mover is a revelation in bike cleaning technology!  With its unique blend of softeners, detergents and foaming agents, Earth Mover gives you the ultimate all over foam cleaning experience.

Our unique trigger spray gives you the choice of a foam or spray action.

Earth Mover cuts through dirt, grime and grease, giving your bike that brand new look every clean.  Earth Mover’s unique foaming technology offers a much longer cleaning contact time, and you can see the dirt, grease and grime breaking down before your eyes.  Earth Mover is safe to use on paintwork, carbon fibre, disc brakes, aluminum, rubber and titanium, and is totally environmentally friendly.

For:

-          Off road motorcycles – Moto X, Enduro, Trial, Speedway...

-          Mountain bikes

-          Sidecars

-          Quads

-          Road Motorcycles

-          Karts

-          Road Bicycles

-          BMX

-          Stock car

name: Wagon Wash
description:
Dirty weekend? Camper needs a clean? Wagon wash is the one for you, with our unique formulas after a weekend away Wagon Wash will clean up in no time at all, making the after math of a weekend away effortless. with an advanced foam cleaning formula which can be used manually or through a pressure washer, Wagon Washes rich foaming action will loosen and brake down the toughest dirt.

name: Launch
description:
A unique Marine cleaning formula which contains no solvents, acids or caustic. this environmentally friendly biodegradable formula is completely safe to use on all external areas of your marine craft. Removes embedded stains, salt residue,bird lime, oil, grime, marine scum, leaving your boat sparkling!

name: Mud Slider
description: Mud Slider: is a new concept in bike cleaning giving your bike a protective coating which is non slip, reducing the buildup of mud dirt and grime on your bike during racing, after race cleaning is made much easier and reducing the amount of water you use.

name: Smart'n'Ezee
description: Gives your car or bike: A fantastic long lasting shiny finish and a protective coating which helps stop dirt and grime from sticking to your cars paintwork or bike frame, spray it on your aluminium wheels to give that new look with the added bonus of reducing the amount of dirt and brake dust sticking to your wheels.

name: Rim Bling
description:
Rim Bling is a bio degradable wheel cleaner put together to give your wheels the bling they need, to give your car that brand new look. Want to clean your wheels? Don't want the hassle of corrosive chemicals? RIM BLING IT! Try Ducksmart's unique Rim Bling today and let the Duck bling your rims!


See Rim Bling in action from 1:30
